summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.3°C) and outside temperature (up 2.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.9 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1764 m), light levels (up 5468 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 180.0m lower than yesterday, 665.0m lower than the past week, 1764.2m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 887.0m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1552.0m and 2650m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and winds will be practically absent. Light to moderate rain is forecast, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
